'''''Lights Will Guide You Home (I)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to follow 8 [[Seelie]] to their Seelie Courts on [[Narukami Island]], [[Kannazuka]], and [[Yashiori Island]] in Inazuma.
